text:
Big QoL requests:
• ability to set a default template with default settings for users meeting links
• when you do something with meeting links and click back, remember where you were (all users) instead of just reverting to your meeting links

If we brought HubDB down to CMS starter (and maybe free), knowing we would likely impose some limits at the lower tiers, how many tables/rows per table would you say is reasonable to expect at starter?
<@U04T2CUCP8T> how would you use HubDB in Sales Hub?
I think 10 tables at 100 rows each would cover our use case for the clients with starter.
these are just sort of arbitrary round numbers though.
Hi Dawid - this is already possible, I added a reply to the idea with more details :slightly_smiling_face:
